verses.verse: וַיַּמְלִיכוּ֩ <WH4427> king יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> And the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחַזְיָ֨הוּ <WH274> Ahaziah בְנ֤וֹ <WH1121> son הַקָּטֹן֙ <WH6996> his youngest תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> his place כִּ֤י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> all הָרִאשֹׁנִים֙ <WH7223> all the eldest הָרַ֣ג <WH2026> had slain הַגְּד֔וּד <WH1416> in his stead for the band of men הַבָּ֥א <WH935> that came בָֽעַרְבִ֖ים <WH6163> with the Arabians לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> to the camp וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <WH4427> reigned אֲחַזְיָ֥הוּ <WH274> So Ahaziah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹרָ֖ם <WH3088> of Jehoram מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah פ

בֶּן־ <WH1121> old אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <WH705> Forty וּשְׁתַּ֤יִם <WH8147> and two שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years אֲחַזְיָ֣הוּ <WH274> [was] Ahaziah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְשָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year אַחַ֔ת <WH259> one מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> His mother's עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH6271> also [was] Athaliah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter עָמְרִֽי׃ <WH6018> of Omri

גַּם־ <WH1571> also ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הָלַ֔ךְ <WH1980> He also walked בְּדַרְכֵ֖י <WH1870> in the ways בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> of Ahab כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִמּ֛וֹ <WH517> for his mother הָיְתָ֥ה <WH1961> become יֽוֹעַצְתּ֖וֹ <WH3289> was his counsellor לְהַרְשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH7561> to do wickedly

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <WH6213> Wherefore he did הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> like the house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> of Ahab כִּי־ <WH3588> for הֵ֜מָּה <WH1992> like הָֽיוּ־ <WH1961> become ל֣וֹ יֽוֹעֲצִ֗ים <WH3289> for they were his counsellors אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after מ֥וֹת <WH4194> the death אָבִ֖יו <WH1> of his father לְמַשְׁחִ֥ית <WH4889> to his destruction לֽוֹ׃

גַּ֣ם <WH1571> also בַּעֲצָתָם֮ <WH6098> also after their counsel הָלַךְ֒ <WH1980> He walked וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <WH1980> and went אֶת־ <WH854> with יְהוֹרָ֨ם <WH3088> with Jehoram בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַחְאָ֜ב <WH256> of Ahab מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <WH4421> to war עַל־ <WH5921> against חֲזָאֵ֥ל <WH2371> against Hazael מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> of Syria בְּרָמ֣וֹת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וַיַּכּ֥וּ <WH5221> smote הָֽרַמִּ֖ים <WH7421> and the Syrians אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹרָֽם׃ <WH3141> Joram

וַיָּ֜שָׁב <WH7725> And he returned לְהִתְרַפֵּ֣א <WH7495> to be healed בְיִזְרְעֶ֗אל <WH3157> in Jezreel כִּ֤י <WH3588> because הַמַּכִּים֙ <WH4347> because of the wounds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִכֻּ֣הוּ <WH5221> which were given בָֽרָמָ֔ה <WH7414> him at Ramah בְּהִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וֹ <WH3898> when he fought אֶת־ <WH854> against חֲזָהאֵ֖ל <WH2371> with Hazael מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of Syria וַעֲזַרְיָ֨הוּ <WH5838> And Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹרָ֜ם <WH3088> of Jehoram מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah יָרַ֡ד <WH3381> went down לִרְא֞וֹת <WH7200> to see אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹרָ֧ם <WH3088> Jehoram בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אַחְאָ֛ב <WH256> of Ahab בְּיִזְרְעֶ֖אל <WH3157> at Jezreel כִּי־ <WH3588> because חֹלֶ֥ה <WH2470> because he was sick הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וּמֵֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> was of God הָיְתָה֙ <WH1961> become תְּבוּסַ֣ת <WH8395> And the destruction אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah לָב֖וֹא <WH935> by coming אֶל־ <WH413> against יוֹרָ֑ם <WH3141> to Joram וּבְבֹא֗וֹ <WH935> for when he was come יָצָ֤א <WH3318> he went out עִם־ <WH5973> with יְהוֹרָם֙ <WH3088> with Jehoram אֶל־ <WH413> against יֵה֣וּא <WH3058> against Jehu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son נִמְשִׁ֔י <WH5250> of Nimshi אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom מְשָׁח֣וֹ <WH4886> had anointed יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> whom the LORD לְהַכְרִ֖ית <WH3772> to cut off אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house אַחְאָֽב׃ <WH256> of Ahab

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came כְּהִשָּׁפֵ֥ט <WH8199> was executing judgment יֵה֖וּא <WH3058> And it came to pass that when Jehu עִם־ <WH5973> on בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> upon the house אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> of Ahab וַיִּמְצָא֩ <WH4672> and found אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֨י <WH8269> the princes יְהוּדָ֜ה <WH3063> of Judah וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> and the sons אֲחֵ֧י <WH251> of the brethren אֲחַזְיָ֛הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah מְשָׁרְתִ֥ים <WH8334> that ministered לַאֲחַזְיָ֖הוּ <WH274> to Ahaziah וַיַּהַרְגֵֽם׃ <WH2026> he slew

וַיְבַקֵּשׁ֩ <WH1245> And he sought אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחַזְיָ֨הוּ <WH274> Ahaziah וַֽיִּלְכְּדֻ֜הוּ <WH3920> and they caught וְה֧וּא <WH1931> he מִתְחַבֵּ֣א <WH2244> him (for he was hid בְשֹֽׁמְר֗וֹן <WH8111> Samaria וַיְבִאֻ֣הוּ <WH935> brought אֶל־ <WH413> to יֵהוּא֮ <WH3058> him to Jehu וַיְמִתֻהוּ֒ <WH4191> and when they had slain וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֔הוּ <WH6912> him they buried כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אָֽמְרוּ֙ <WH559> him Because said בֶּן־ <WH1121> they he [is] the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat ה֔וּא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who דָּרַ֥שׁ <WH1875> who sought אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָב֑וֹ <WH3824> with all his heart וְאֵין֙ <WH369> there לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> So the house אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah לַעְצֹ֥ר <WH6113> to keep כֹּ֖חַ <WH3581> had no power לְמַמְלָכָֽה׃ <WH4467> still the kingdom

וַעֲתַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH6271> But when Athaliah אֵ֣ם <WH517> the mother אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah רָאֲתָ֖ה <WH7200> saw כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead בְּנָ֑הּ <WH1121> that her son וַתָּ֗קָם <WH6965> she arose וַתְּדַבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> and destroyed אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> all the seed הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <WH4467> royal לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

וַתִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> took יְהוֹשַׁבְעַ֨ת <WH3090> But Jehoshabeath בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹאָ֣שׁ <WH3101> Joash בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲחַזְיָ֗הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah וַתִּגְנֹ֤ב <WH1589> and stole אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> מִתּ֤וֹךְ <WH8432> him from among בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king's הַמּ֣וּמָתִ֔ים <WH4191> that were slain וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and put אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> מֵֽינִקְתּ֖וֹ <WH3243> him and his nurse בַּחֲדַ֣ר <WH2315> chamber הַמִּטּ֑וֹת <WH4296> bed וַתַּסְתִּירֵ֡הוּ <WH5641> be absent יְהוֹשַׁבְעַ֣ת <WH3090> So Jehoshabeath בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of king יְהוֹרָ֡ם <WH3088> Jehoram אֵשֶׁת֩ <WH802> the wife יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הִיא֩ <WH1931> he הָיְתָ֨ה <WH1961> become אֲח֧וֹת <WH269> (for she was the sister אֲחַזְיָ֛הוּ <WH274> of Ahaziah מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> him from עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH6271> Athaliah וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not הֱמִיתָֽתְהוּ׃ <WH4191> so that she slew

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become אִתָּם֙ <WH854> in בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God מִתְחַבֵּ֖א <WH2244> And he was with them hid שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> six שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years וַעֲתַלְיָ֖ה <WH6271> and Athaliah מֹלֶ֥כֶת <WH4427> reigned עַל־ <WH5921> over הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> over the land פ
